CREATE TABLE "Categories" (
    "Id" integer GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY,
    "Name" character varying(100) NOT NULL,
    "Description" character varying(500),
    CONSTRAINT "PK_Categories" PRIMARY KEY ("Id")
);
